title: Geralt10

content: Up for Sale 1 btc fully loaded 1 oz Casascius coin from 2013. Only 536 of these left still active or so. Probably a lot less now.Description:   1 BTC Fine Silver Casascius Round.This is a 39mm 1oz silver round loaded with one digital bitcoin.Status:   ActiveType:   1 BTCLink to verify https://casascius.uberbills.com/?address=1Ag5kEYY9vtoGZDVNH7j2AWmxYVaGTC3mShttps://i.imgur.com/wVnjmy2.jpg Image 1 of fronthttps://i.imgur.com/LIgHBWf.jpg  Image 2 of backhttps://i.imgur.com/a/861vLun.jpg Image 3 just took these two to show the plastic case has the " milk" spot, not the coin itself which is in perfect condition.Taking offers now in BTC (Preferred), or USD wire transfer, let the bidding begin.We can also use an escrow service such as minerjones at your expense. Shipping will be hand delivered. Payment will be done with a signed PGP message and payment address.Also more in depth and detailed pictures from all angles/lighting available at buyers request once confirmed you're a serious offer.
